The three knowledges in the training of: Knowledge of the death and rebirth of sentient beings
Knowledge of the ending of defilements
The three knowledges that make a brahmin: Well-versed in cosmology and the marks of a great man
The qualities of a master of the three k: Understanding of the ending of defilements
Freedom from the defilements of sensuality, desire to be reborn, and ignorance
Knowledge that rebirth is ended and the spiritual journey has been completed.
